name: Bitsy's Romanian Home Part. 2 (RomajiAdventures)
description:
Languages used: Japanese (Romaji) and English

The game explores Bitsy's Romanian house. As the parts progress, you can travel more and more through Bitsy's universe.

Message from Bitsy himself: I love creating maps that are personal to me. It gives people from around the world a chance to get a peek inside my life, while encouraging them to use their creativity and imagine how the real deal looks like. It's also a great platform for me to give shout-outs to my girl and homies.
